details.description: Find out what benefits you could get, how much you could get and how to claim
details.more_information:
%This calculator will time out after 20 minutes of inactivity - if you need more time you can save your answers and return to it later.%

Use this service to get benefit advice for you, your family or someone else. You can answer questions anonymously about your savings, income and outgoings.

You can save your answers for 7 days, and download or print your results.

This service isn't accurate for:

- prisoners
- [students](/extra-money-pay-university "Extra money to pay for university")
- under 18s
- people living outside the UK
details.introduction: Get an estimate of what benefits (eg Income Support or Jobseeker's Allowance) and tax credits you could get, and find out about claiming specific benefits.
